home.title: TickFlow - Elegant Online Clock
home.subtitle: A clean and beautiful web clock application that makes time display a pleasure.

analog.title: Analog Clock
analog.description: Classic analog clock display with multiple dial styles and hand animations.

digital.title: Digital Clock
digital.description: Clear digital time display with 12/24 hour format switching.

timezone.title: Multi-timezone
timezone.description: Support for major global timezones, easily view times in different regions.

about.title: About
about.description: TickFlow is an open-source online clock application dedicated to providing users with an elegant time display experience.

share.title: Share
share.text: Check out this elegant online clock app!

metadata.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock App
metadata.description: TickFlow is a feature-rich online clock application that provides flip clock, digital clock, analog clock and other clock styles. Supports real-time display, elegant animations, responsive design, bringing you the ultimate time experience.
metadata.keywords: online clock,real-time clock,digital clock,flip clock,analog clock,time display,world clock,clock app,TickFlow,在线时钟,实时时钟,数字时钟,翻转时钟,模拟时钟,时间显示,世界时钟,时钟应用

openGraph.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock App
openGraph.description: Feature-rich online clock application with flip clock, digital clock, analog clock and other styles, supporting real-time display and elegant animation effects

twitter.title: TickFlow - Elegant Clock App
twitter.description: Feature-rich online clock application supporting flip clock, digital clock and other styles
